issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Implement COUNT aggregate function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4596](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4596). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add support for COUNT aggregate function. See SUM function in aggregates.rs for inspiration.

SQL parser should support COUNT(1) and COUNT ( \* ) syntax for counting rows as well as COUNT(column_name) for counting non-null values for a column.

COUNT(DISTINCT expr) should be handled in a separate issue since it is more complex.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4596?focusedCommentId=16789313) by Luca Palmieri (LukeMathWalker):*
I'd be happy to work on this! Should I ask you to mark it as in progress `[~andygrove]`?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4596?focusedCommentId=16789640) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
`[~LukeMathWalker]` I just added you to the Contributor role so you should be able to click "start progress" now which will also assign the issue to you

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4596?focusedCommentId=16797381) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Hi `[~LukeMathWalker]`, Arrow developers will be releasing an 0.13 RC probably in the next few days. Are you still comfortable with getting this ready by then, or should we move it to the 0.14 release?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4596?focusedCommentId=16798398) by Luca Palmieri (LukeMathWalker):*
Hi [~nevi_me], I have started working on this but I don't think I will be able to wrap it up before 0.13 is released!

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4596?focusedCommentId=16807240) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4036
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4036>
